text: Arau sihamte tomaka hayeja samparke prasna karae, koraa, ‘i ebidha asuci’. Eteke tomaloke hayeja arasthata strai-sangamara paraa birata thaka arau paraitra nohoraalaike (sangamara babe) sihamtara nikatabarti naha’ba. Tara pichata sihamte yetiya uttamaraupe paraisud'dha ha’ba tetiya sihamtara ocarata thika tenekai gamana karaiba yenekai allahe tomalokaka adesa diche. Niscaya allaha ta'obakaraisakalaka bhala paya arau sihamtako bhala paya yisakale adhika paraitrata arjana karae
